description:
Japan’s desire for World Cup glory leads the Japanese Football Association to launch a new rigorous training program to find the national team’s next striker. Three hundred high school players are pitted against each other for the position, but only one will come out on top. Who among them will be the striker to usher in a new era of Japanese soccer?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Athletics
tags.description: Centers around sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, or walking.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Augmented Reality
tags.description: Prominently features events with augmented reality as the main setting.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

Animator and character designer affiliated with A-1 Pictures.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakugabu)__

__Hiromi Sakamoto__ is a Japanese designer and animator, who does costume design, animation direction, in-between, key and 2nd key animation.
**Sugiyama Shinji (杉山晋史)** is a Japanese art designer and background artist.

[Website](https://junmurayama.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jun_murayama)

__Introduction:__
Jun Murayama is a Japanese musician, known for doing music composition and arrangement, while also being a music producer, pianist and keyboardist. He is also a member of the bands Venomstrip and FLOWER FLOWER.

__Biography:__
He started playing the piano at the age of three, then later on as a third year college student, he started his professional career after being scouted by the Light Music Club. Following this he joined [Koichi Domoto's](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koichi_Domoto) tour, whom he knew from college.

He's mostly known as the keyboardist to the four-piece rock band FLOWER FLOWER with the stage name mura☆jun, which he joined in 2013. In the band his name was mistakenly introduced as 松潤 (Matsujun) when referring to members, so  instead of his actual stage name mura☆jun the fans have nicknamed him as such.
